snippet.title: Agent Roy - Secure the Temple - Official Trailer. Version 1.1
snippet.description:
Download the Game from STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2256650/AgentRoy__Secure_The_Temple/

Set in a temple on a tropical island, Agent Roy® - Secure the temple, a cunningly detailed 3rd person action shooter that pushes the boundaries of combat to shocking new levels. 
Freelance Agent Roy is deployed to protect the VIPs in the temple. Roy cursing the day he ever came to this island, is now facing artillery fire from a mysterious militia group swarming the temple.
With their boat destroyed and weapons stolen, Roy now finds himself facing an army of mercenaries, with nothing but a gun and his wits to survive. Roy informed his team with the coordinates, and they need 5 minutes to reach the island. Agent Roy is now facing his most challenging task to date.

How long can Agent Roy Secure the temple and protect the VIPs from the mercenaries?

The game is developed by the team of Royex Studio (https://royex.studio) and Royex Studio is a part of Royex Technologies (https://www.royex.ae). For more information you can visit https://agentroy.com/
